SELECT x.id houseId, x.`code` houseCode , x.apartment_id apartmentId , x.rent_type rentType, x.community_name communityName, x.acreage acreage, x.room room, x.hall hall, x.wei wei, x.floor floor, x.total_floor totalFloor, x.lift_type liftType, x.rent_amt rentAmt, x.zujin_type zujinType, x.`status` houseStatus, x.title title , x.description description, x.housekeeper_tel housekeeperTel, x.total_doors totalDoors, x.room_acreage room_acreage, y.id idImg, y.url url, y.type type, z.reserve_date reserveDate, w.detail_addr detailAddr
FROM (SELECT * FROM t_zfang_reserve_house where telphone =#{telphone} and is_delete = '00') z LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_zfang_house_img where is_delete = '00') y on y.house_id = z.house_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_zfang_house where is_delete = '00') x on z.house_id = x.id LEFT JOIN t_zfang_house_location w on z.house_id = w.house_id where x.`status`='2'
ORDER BY z.reserve_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_zfang_reserve_house where telphone = #{telphone};
